author: mbautin
msg: [HBASE-6250] [89-fb] Use lowest possible versions for Put and Delete RPC
Summary: If optional fields such as writeToWAL are not specified (or are set to default values), we need to use the lowest possible versions of Put and Delete RPC format for backward-compatibility.

author: mbautin
msg: [HBASE-6251] [89-fb] Don't abort on flush failure in unit tests

If HLog flush fails, we don't want to abort the whole process in unit tests. Instead, we want to throw a RuntimeException. Reusing the existing Abortable class hierarchy. Also making RuntimeHaltAbortStrategy a singleton.

author: apurtell
msg: HBASE-6207. Add jitter to client retry timer (Elliott Clark)

author: elecharny
msg: o Added tests for the browse() method
